title: I'm Not Sharing The GRAVY
body_text:
It's only
EastCoastDodgeball's
most intense war ever, and guess what .. it's back!
Awarded in 2007 as the sport's "Rivalry of the Year," this brutal, barbaric, multi-year struggle hasn't been settled just yet as the soldiers of the famed Team WALL army prepare to defend their home turf for the 11th time against the nasty pack of Team ALL invaders. History has shown that both cohesiveness and numbers will play a major role in this upcoming confrontation. Join the warriors of
ECD
for this soon-to-be earth-rumbling brawl.
Team WALL Breakdown!
Equipped with some of the game's biggest weapons, the WALL Army will stop at absolutely nothing to successfully defend their territory. They have amassed a total of 6 victories out of a possible 10 - an impressive feat given the smaller squad size.
Potential combatants competing in
WALL v. ALL 11
include season finale headliner Michelle Mullins, the fearless animal Justin Wolf, powerhouse female titan Alison Bertsch, and a slew of
ECDElite
inaugural class inductees: Justin Pierce, Kevin Adams, Kevin Fitzpatrick, and Chris Adams.
> > > DOWNFALL ?
WALL's inability to round enough troops may be its primary cause for concern. While they have managed to squeak by on limited human resources in the past, this forthcoming fight to the finish may truly test their resolve.
Team ALL Breakdown!
The sometimes China-sized clan of foot soldiers has both experienced the sweet taste of triumph and the bitter agony of defeat. ALL has previously been known to wage war with an extremely high number of last-minute allies - who knows what to expect this time around!
Potential combatants competing in
WALL v. ALL 11
include Hall of Fame-bound competitors Lauren Stopa and Michael Edwards, "The Writer's" right-hand man John Tronolone,
Family Affair 2009
headliner Jon Yochum, and revered
ECDElitists
Kevin Megill, Diana DiBuccio, and Michael "Sputz" Krott.
> > > DOWNFALL ?
The last two months haven't been kind to several members of the ALL Army. Tronolone and Megill continue to suffer from damaged cannon right and left arms respectively while female sensations Mari Travassos and Ashley Hoppe's knees remain at less than full strength. Tack on the broken toe of one "Sputz" and surrender may be in this group's immediate future.
If you're thirsty for more, links to each WALL v. ALL results page are in purple to conclude this entry.
________________________________________
_____________________________
ECDElite
Second Induction!
On
September 11, 2010
, the
ECD
community welcomed seven - C. Adams, Pierce, Fitzpatrick, "Sputz" Krott, K. Adams, Megill, and DiBuccio - of the most dominant, contributing, and influential warriors of all-time into the prestigious inaugural class of the
ECDElite
Hall of Fame.
At
EastCoastDodgeball
"Wall Brawl" on November 27, two more deserving, longtime veterans will be paid the same respect for their countless years of dedication and commitment both on and off the dodgeball battlegrounds. In addition, the
ECDElite
halls will open its golden doors to its first
ECDElite Family
inductees, praising the collective accomplishments and contributions of one
ECD's
most recognized set of relatives.
So once again, please pay
EastCoastDodgeball
"Wall Brawl" a visit in honoring these legends. The special induction ceremony will certainly be worth everyone's [free] admission!
________________________________________
_____________________________

body_html:
It's only EastCoastDodgeball's most intense war ever, and guess what .. it's back!

Awarded in 2007 as the sport's "Rivalry of the Year," this brutal, barbaric, multi-year struggle hasn't been settled just yet as the soldiers of the famed Team WALL army prepare to defend their home turf for the 11th time against the nasty pack of Team ALL invaders. History has shown that both cohesiveness and numbers will play a major role in this upcoming confrontation. Join the warriors of ECD for this soon-to-be earth-rumbling brawl.

Team WALL Breakdown!
Equipped with some of the game's biggest weapons, the WALL Army will stop at absolutely nothing to successfully defend their territory. They have amassed a total of 6 victories out of a possible 10 - an impressive feat given the smaller squad size.

Potential combatants competing in WALL v. ALL 11 include season finale headliner Michelle Mullins, the fearless animal Justin Wolf, powerhouse female titan Alison Bertsch, and a slew of ECDElite inaugural class inductees: Justin Pierce, Kevin Adams, Kevin Fitzpatrick, and Chris Adams.

> > > DOWNFALL ?
WALL's inability to round enough troops may be its primary cause for concern. While they have managed to squeak by on limited human resources in the past, this forthcoming fight to the finish may truly test their resolve.

Team ALL Breakdown!
The sometimes China-sized clan of foot soldiers has both experienced the sweet taste of triumph and the bitter agony of defeat. ALL has previously been known to wage war with an extremely high number of last-minute allies - who knows what to expect this time around!

Potential combatants competing in WALL v. ALL 11 include Hall of Fame-bound competitors Lauren Stopa and Michael Edwards, "The Writer's" right-hand man John Tronolone, Family Affair 2009 headliner Jon Yochum, and revered ECDElitists Kevin Megill, Diana DiBuccio, and Michael "Sputz" Krott.

> > > DOWNFALL ?
The last two months haven't been kind to several members of the ALL Army. Tronolone and Megill continue to suffer from damaged cannon right and left arms respectively while female sensations Mari Travassos and Ashley Hoppe's knees remain at less than full strength. Tack on the broken toe of one "Sputz" and surrender may be in this group's immediate future.

If you're thirsty for more, links to each WALL v. ALL results page are in purple to conclude this entry.

_____________________________________________________________________


ECDElite Second Induction!
On September 11, 2010, the ECD community welcomed seven - C. Adams, Pierce, Fitzpatrick, "Sputz" Krott, K. Adams, Megill, and DiBuccio - of the most dominant, contributing, and influential warriors of all-time into the prestigious inaugural class of the ECDElite Hall of Fame.

At EastCoastDodgeball "Wall Brawl" on November 27, two more deserving, longtime veterans will be paid the same respect for their countless years of dedication and commitment both on and off the dodgeball battlegrounds. In addition, the ECDElite halls will open its golden doors to its first ECDElite Family inductees, praising the collective accomplishments and contributions of one ECD's most recognized set of relatives.

So once again, please pay EastCoastDodgeball "Wall Brawl" a visit in honoring these legends. The special induction ceremony will certainly be worth everyone's [free] admission!

_____________________________________________________________________
